//: Several properties of this file will be derived from the project's root
package.json while packing. This is done to avoid duplication and to
name: @sass-fairy/math
description: Provides extended functionality for working with numbers in Sass

scripts.new:pack: yarn clean-package && yarn pack && clean-package restore --config $npm_package_config_clean_package
scripts.new:publish: yarn clean-package && yarn publish && clean-package restore --config $npm_package_config_clean_package
